ComicInfo.Summary:
San Diego is facing some kind of impending mystical apocalypse and the epicenter of it might just be Robyn's current love interest; an oil billionaire with a taste for pre-Columbian antiquities. And the city isn't safe from Sam Cavendar's new alter ego. She's Marian's sweetheart by day and a ravaging hell-beast from beyond the stars by night. It's going to take more than a well-placed arrow to make this right! Chuck (Bane:Conquest) Dixon brings the mystery, action and horror you look for in comics!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Riveiro & Ceci de la Cruz | 1 | B | Cover B | Julius Abrera & Robby Bevard | 2 | C | Cover C | Noah Salonga & Ylenia Di Napoli | 3 | D | Cover D | Sheldon Goh & Sanju Nivangune | 4 | E | Awesome Con Cosplay Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Mike DeBalfo (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | F | In-Store Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Derlis Santacruz (a) & Sanju Nivangune (c) | Missing | G | WonderCon Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Derlis Santacruz (a) & Sanju Nivangune (c) | Missing | H | WonderCon Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 75 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing |
